description: At our farmers’ market we picked up a dozen ears of corn for a weekend barbecue With several ears left over, I repurposed the corn as the starting point for two salads One emphasized cherry tomatoes, the other Italian parsley, both in plentiful supply at the farmers’ market.
title: Grilled Corn and Tomato Salsa Salad
title_page: Grilled Corn and Tomato Salsa Salad Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
At our farmers’ market we picked up a dozen ears of corn for a weekend barbecue. With several ears left over, I repurposed the corn as the starting point for two salads. One emphasized cherry tomatoes, the other Italian parsley, both in plentiful supply at the farmers’ market.
Featured in: Recipe(S) Of The Day: Grilled Corn Redux.
